title: MarkLogic University - Build an Application on Marklogic from Scratch
abstract: In this one-hour session we will discuss the architecture and implementation of projects built using the App Builder tool. The majority of the hour will be spent customizing a specific App Builder project by integrating with the existing project content and code. This is a hands-on session so please bring your laptop. We will have several laptops available on a first-come, first-serve basis.

surveys.comments: This was a great session. Conference could use more sessions like it.
Need to prepare for Mac users next time. Prefer to have more ML University sessions in future events.
